records.content:
Only includes Cookbooks from ProjectPythia-MystMD

Pythia Cookbooks provide example workflows on more advanced and domain-specific problems developed by the Pythia community. Cookbooks build on top of skills you learn in 

Pythia Foundations.

Cookbooks are created from Jupyter Notebooks that we strive to binderize so each Cookbook can be 

executed in the cloud with a single click from your browser, but in some instances executing a Cookbook will require 

running the notebooks locally.

Interested in contributing a new Cookbook or contributing to an existing Cookbook? Great! Please see the 

Project Pythia Cookbook Contributorâ€™s Guide, and consider opening a discussion under the 

Project Pythia category of the Pangeo Discourse.
